de.tud.cib.bimsage.annotation.xmlUtil

Class AnnotationXMLParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tud.cib.bimsage.annotation.xmlUtil.AnnotationXMLParser

  • public class AnnotationXMLParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides functions for reading, writing and validating annotation XML files Can transform data from an annotation XML file into an AnnotationData object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods

      Checks a given XML file against the annotation XSD.

      • validateXML

        public static boolean validateXML(java.nio.file.Path xmlFile)
                           throws org.jdom2.JDOMException,
                                  java.io.IOException
        Checks a given XML file against the annotation XSD.
        Parameters:
        xmlFile - The XML file that needs to be checked
        Returns:
        returns true if the XML is valid against the XSD. Otherwise returns false.
        Throws:
        org.jdom2.JDOMException
        java.io.IOException
